alert.note: Alert for Northern Trinity; Southern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 4:18AM PST until January 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow above 2500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Trinity County including the higher summits on Hwy 3, 299 and 36. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
